import React, { useState } from 'react' const DesignPage = () => { const [Ccolor, setCcolor] = useState("azure"); const [Ffont, setFfont] = useState("18"); const [Rrange, setRrange] = useState("0"); const [Fcolor, setFcolor] = useState("black"); const [Direction, setDirection] = useState("right"); const [Lgfont, setLgfont] = useState('18'); const [Border,setBorder] = useState('0'); const [isCode, setisCode] = useState(false); const [Ffamily, setFfamily] = useState('arial'); const color = (ev) => { setCcolor(ev.target.style.backgroundColor); } const getFont = (ev) => { let val = ev.target.value; setFfont(val); } const getRange = (ev) => { let val = ev.target.value; setRrange(val); } const getFcolor = (ev) => { let val = ev.target.value; setFcolor(val); } const getDirection = (ev) => { let val = ev.target.value; setDirection(val); } const getLgfont = (ev) => { setLgfont(ev.target.value) } const getFamily = (ev) => { setFfamily(ev.target.value) } const getBorder = (ev) => { setBorder(ev.target.value) } return ( <>
  • LOGO
  • Login
  • create
  • Home
{ isCode? 
{`
                                
                                
    
    
    Page Title

                            `}
: '' }
) } export default DesignPage
